execution_quality: Good structured planning with clear design decisions, but execution was incomplete—the agent planned thoroughly but only partially implemented the core infrastructure, leaving the actual integration work unfinished.
work_category: Architecture planning and implementation scaffolding for an Emacs integration testing framework, using plan mode to design headless Emacs testing infrastructure with manual and automated capabilities.
summary: The agent successfully entered plan mode, researched the existing codebase, and designed a comprehensive testing infrastructure architecture. However, the implementation was cut short—only basic scaffolding (fixtures, test utilities) was written before the session ended, leaving the core headless Emacs client integration and actual test cases unimplemented. The planning was sound and well-communicated, but the user's follow-up silence and incomplete implementation suggest potential misalignment on whether planning alone was sufficient or if hands-on implementation was expected to continue.
follow_up_pattern: User's empty next message with session termination suggests either satisfaction with the planning phase alone, or they are evaluating the scaffolding before continuing work themselves. No explicit approval or concerns were raised.
